Open Evening 1
event.description: Open Evenings for prospective Year 7 students and their parents are on Wednesday 18th September and Thursday 19th September from 7.00pm to 9.00pm. The Headmaster’s Presentation will be at 7.00pm. There is limited parking on the school site, please use public car parks in Amersham.
